model

Class Pension

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Account
      • model.Pension

  • public class Pension
extends Account
    Implementation of a pension account. Don't implement deposit() or withdraw(); don't need to add implements Accounts.
    Version:
    release-1.0.0 Initial version
    Author:
    D.K.Sweeney 2/5/2016

      This method builds the initial data structure.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pension

        public Pension(double monthlyAmount,
               int startAge,
               boolean inflationAdjusted,
               double inflation,
               int currentAge,
               int currentYear,
               int deathAge)
        This method builds the initial data structure. It assumes that the monthly Amount doesn't increase.
        Parameters:
        monthlyAmount - The current yearly expenses.
        startAge - The age that the pension starts
        inflationAdjusted - Is the yearly amount adjusted for inflation
        inflation - The expected value of inflation
        currentAge - The current age of the person
        currentYear - The current year of the person
        deathAge - The expected death age of the person

    • Method Detail

      • isTaxable

        public boolean isTaxable()
        Get the taxability of this account.
        Returns:
        boolean
